Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you go. A letter for you, Iroha.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you.  I appreciate the delivery.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's my job! My work here is done.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, this is a coincidence! I'm happy
to see you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tina just brought a letter for me. Who
could possibly be writing to me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's a letter from my mother. She wants
me to go back home. How did she know
where to find me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>To tell you the truth, I left home after
a fight with my father.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I come from a family of blacksmiths. My
father, my mother, my brothers are all
blacksmiths.
<PAGE>
However, my father didn't want me to
become one. He's intent on me becoming
someone's wife!
<PAGE>
I've tried to persuade him, in as many
ways as I can think of, but he's hard
as steel on this topic. So I left.
<PAGE>
If I do go back nothing's going to have
changed. I can't go back to that house.

Iroha is saying she will never go home.
What will you say to her?
Don't worry about it
You should try and resolve the issue

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're right, <MYNAME>! Nothing to worry
about. I knew you'd understand.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
However, I did leave without saying
anything to my mother or brothers. I'm
sure they are worried about me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not going to go home, but I think I
will send a reply to the letter. Thanks
for your help, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'd better write the letter while it's
all still fresh in my mind. Strike while
the iron's hot! Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sure my father will be even more
angry with me now that I left.
<PAGE>
I don't think there's anything I could
possibly say to persuade him.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I know my father. There's nothing. He'll
never budge. Can we talk about something
else?

Iroha has no intention of resolving the
issue with her family. Any ideas?
I'll help you to sort this out
You sound just as stubborn!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? You'll help me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you.
<PAGE>
I can't believe how much stronger that
makes me feel. Okay. We'll try again.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll send a letter to my mother right
away, letting her know that I want to
talk to my father again.
<PAGE>
I'm happy to have seen you, <MYNAME>, but
I'd better get home and start writing.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'll walk home with me? Well, thank
you very much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You might be right. I have certainly
inherited his stubborn streak.
<PAGE>
You think I should try and avoid being
so emotional, correct?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Very well. I will try and resolve the
issue.
<PAGE>
I'll send a letter to my mother right
away, letting her know that I want to
talk to my father again.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for your input, <MYNAME>. I'll
give it another try.
